class: The class of the developer is determined from his experience, rating, type of employment.
rating: Developer rating is determined by its activity, the number of successful orders and time.
employment: If the developer has a hired status, this means that he is an official employee of our company, and not a freelancer.
experience: Experience shows the maximum number of years of work in a particular field.
team-list: List of teams the developer is a member of.
